description: You are breathing through your skin.

description: Dancing flames hovering over your hand.  You can use this to provide heat and light when necessary.
Your powers allow you to communicate by radio waves.  With a moment's concentration, you may instead scan for radio signals.
Your powers allow you to listen for radio signals from the surrounding area.  With a moment's concentration, you may change frequency or switch to communicating by radio.
A thin, searing beam, almost too bright to look at.  You can use this to weld or cut through things.
You can lift one thing with your powers, removing its effect on your encumbrance.
